name: Road Trip (BigFoot1709)
description:
You find yourself on a road trip you would rather not be on. Find a way to escape the car.

Instructions to play:

  • A PS4 Controller must be used in order to play to game.
  • Use Right Analog stick to look around the inside of the car.
  • Use Right Trigger to interact with object around the car.
  • Use Cross, Circle, Sqaure and Triangle to make decisions when asked to.
  • Use Option button to go back to the Main Menu.

(If any unexpected bugs are encounted simply press the Option button to return to the Main Menu and restart the game)

This game was made by a team:

  • Devan Gray
  • Leia French
  • Victoria Bench
  • Marco Prinsloo
  • Keaton De Jager

This game was made for a university assignment.
